dmca.title: [EV1-C1321139M] Breach of World Guides Copyright

To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

Posted At: Thursday, October 12, 2006 12:44 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [EV1-C1321139M] Breach of World Guides Copyright
Subject: [EV1-C1321139M] Breach of World Guides Copyright


==== Forwarded Ticket ====

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Webmaster, 
 
Please could you arrange for our listing to be removed from your page 
 
http://1251.zpkawi3.info/ 
 
The listing reads as folllows: 
 
World Guides: Venice 
Despite this, it is always wise to select and make a Venice hotel   
reservation well in advance. There are numerous famous Venice   
attractions and landmarks. ... 
http://www.venice.world-guides.com/ 
 
Thank you for you help and please advise us when this has been done   
so we can close our Breach of Copyright query. 
 
Regards, 
 
Martin 
 
WORLD GUIDES
